title: Start
body:
...

Oh Hey, hello

What is this place?

This place? It doesn't have a name
By the way, how did you get here?

Sometimes I sleep walk...

...
Ok, whatever. 
You want a drink?

What do you got?

Grain Alcohol!

...
ok?

How long has this place been here?

Well since before I came here, at least

How have they not shut this place down?

Well, that's the thing.
The guards and managment all know about this place

What? How?



this place isn't as watertight as it looks
you can find a lot of interesting things by rooting around

So, why don't we escape?

Escape? We're hundreds of miles in the middle of nowhere
